thread.title: Save up to 50% on dining out
thread.title_full: Save up to 50% on dining out - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Save up to 50% on dining out
text: Claim your free two month membership to the Gourmet Society. The Gourmet Society is one of the UK’s leading dining clubs whose members enjoy great discounts at restaurants including Café Rouge, Bella Italia, Prezzo, La Tasca and Strada. Plus, choose from thousands of local restaurants, pubs and free-dining establishments. Here’s what you’re getting, for free (no payment details required): · Unlimited restaurant visits, unlimited savings · Instant access, start using it today · Free mobile app, convenient and easy · No set menus, a la carte choice · Great weekend availability How to claim See the newspaper on Sunday, July 5, 2015 to take advantage of this exclusive offer. Follow @telegraph
